name: The GAME is a LIAR (v0.3)
description:
The game is not finished, only 2 chapters are done for now, which is about a third of the complete story.

This is an entry for the Community Game Jam.

The theme is used for the story, but the story isn't complete enough to get to that part yet, the gameplay mechanics are here but can still change.

This page will be updated and improved with further updates.
